rows.label: qev013901_MSG0001
rows.name: You're... Hmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0002
rows.name:
I don't know if you're aware, but a number of
xenoforms here in New LA were recently murdered
by humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_JNK0010
rows.name: Nod[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell her that you heard about it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_JNK0020
rows.name: Explain[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell her that you were the one who resolved that case.

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0003
rows.name:
It's simply horrible. We all need one another's help,
yet some people still choose violence![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0004
rows.name:
I'm sorry. Here I am ranting away and you don't even
know me. My name is Eliza.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0005
rows.name:
I'm a volunteer working to promote community
solidarity among all New LA residents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0006
rows.name:
Wait, that was you? Oh, I'm so sorry.
I didn't mean to dredge up a painful memory.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0007
rows.name:
It was such a waste. All of us living in New LA need
one another's help, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0008
rows.name:
I'm sorry. Here I am ranting away and you don't even
know me. My name is Eliza.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0009
rows.name:
I'm a volunteer working to promote community
solidarity among all New LA residents.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_JNK0110
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_SEL0111
rows.name: Ask Eliza how she thinks things are going.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_JNK0120
rows.name: Doubt[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_SEL0121
rows.name: Tell Eliza that will be quite the challenge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0010
rows.name:
I'm more optimistic than most about our city.
It's always been a diverse place, after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0011
rows.name:
I hope to broaden that existing sense of tolerance to
include our xenoform friends.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0012
rows.name:
I'm no fool—I understand it will be difficult.
But just because something is hard doesn't mean it
isn't worth doing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0013
rows.name: New LA has always been a racially diverse city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0014
rows.name:
And if our past ancestors were able to get past their
own petty biases, I think we can do the same when
it comes to our xenoform friends here in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0015
rows.name: If I might backtrack for a moment...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0016
rows.name:
The tragic incident I mentioned is just the sort of
thing that holds back progress.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0017
rows.name:
That Alex fellow and his sympathizers have formed a
sort of... Well, I guess you'd call it a militia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0018
rows.name:
Now let me be clear—I don't want anyone to get hurt
over this. Not even members of the militia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0019
rows.name:
I hope to sit down with them and discuss the matter
like the rational humans we all can be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0020
rows.name: Eliza is totally right![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0021
rows.name:
We've gotta be fair here, and opening fire on someone
without at least trying to talk is the most totally unfair
thing you can possibly do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0022
rows.name:
You and the other members of Team Elma have a
reputation for being fair and honest in your dealings
with all people...whether they be human or xenoform.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0023
rows.name:
I hoped you might agree to act as a mediator in these
talks with the militia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0024
rows.name:
You must help us convince these people that their
actions only serve to hurt this great city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0025
rows.name:
Thank you. I'm certain your efforts will make New LA
a more free and equal place for all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0026
rows.name:
And we already know where that xenophobic Alex
creep is![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0027
rows.name:
Friends of the cause spotted him hanging around
Balance Rock over in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0028
rows.name:
I don't know what he's planning, but whatever it is,
I fear more innocent xenoforms may be at risk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0029
rows.name: You have to stop him! You HAVE to![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0030
rows.name: Don't worry, Alice. [ST:gender p1=He p2=She ] will. I know it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0031
rows.name:
Even after the incident, Alex has been seen approaching
various Ma-non.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0032
rows.name:
So Alice and I have been going around and cautioning
them on our own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0033
rows.name: I'm certain Alex does not...appreciate our efforts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0034
rows.name:
We've received a string of threatening messages telling
us to stop interfering.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0035
rows.name:
But our relationship with the kindhearted Ma-non is
just beginning, and this message will never be more
necessary than it is now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0036
rows.name: You must convince Alex that he's wrong![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0037
rows.name: Welcome back. I'm relieved to see you well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0038
rows.name:
It shames me deeply that we humans should have to
fight one another over this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0039
rows.name:
Still, it seems I was right to ask your help.
You made more progress than I'd dared hope.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0040
rows.name: I'm certain one day we'll see eye to eye.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0041
rows.name:
If we redouble our efforts, I know we can make this city
a fair and free place for all its inhabitants.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0042
rows.name: For now, I thank you for your kindness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0043
rows.name: Welcome back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0044
rows.name:
I take it from your expression that you weren't able to
sway him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0045
rows.name:
It shames me deeply that we humans should have to
fight one another over this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0046
rows.name:
But if they resort to violence, I see little alternative but
to meet force with force.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0047
rows.name: That may mean lives are lost.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0048
rows.name: Just the thought is abhorrent to me...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0049
rows.name: In any case, I expect Alex will lie low for now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013901_MSG0050
rows.name:
We must use this time to spread our message of
acceptance and equality for a better New LA.[ST:wait ]
